simulation Module¶

This module contain classes and functions for simulating the converter.

class calib.simulation.IndexCache(ic, a, b)¶

Stores all the pre-computed indexes to simulate.

property a¶

Alias for field number 1

property b¶

Alias for field number 2

property ic¶

Alias for field number 0

calib.simulation.transition_cx_change(prev_cs, prev_cf, next_cs, next_cf)[source]¶

Computes the capacitors that changed from a feedback position to a feedfoward position, the ones that did the oposite during a configurarion transition and the ones that kept their positions.

Parameters

  • prev_cs (numpy.array) – Feedfoward capacitors indexes of the previous configuration.

  • prev_cf (numpy.array) – Feedback capacitors indexes of the previous configuration.

  • next_cs (numpy.array) – Feedfoward capacitors indexes of the next configuration.

  • next_cf (numpy.array) – Feedback capacitors indexes of the next configuration.

Returns

The indexes of the capacitors that changed from the feedfoward to feedback position (cs_cf). And the indexes of the capacitors that changed from the feedfoward to feedback position (cf_cs).

Return type

(numpy.ndarray, numpy.ndarray, numpy.ndarray, numpy.ndarray,)
